title: How is sarah murphy from wwaytv3  doing since her cancer surgery. I have been praying for her and wish her well. She and randy make a good team
text:
Sarah Murphy is cancer free and back at work at WWAY. Here's the story in her own words:

http://www.wwaytv3.com/2015/12/02/sarah-murphy-returns-to-wway-cancer-free/
